Travis Eoff
===========

[City Council](https://www.earlytx.net/Directory.aspx?DID=10)
Title: City Council
[Click here to watch interview with the Mayor](https://youtu.be/pQ1dYF6DojU)

Travis Eoff. is 63 years old and has been a resident of Early since 1963. He graduated from Early High School in 1972 and has been a member of the Early Volunteer Fire Department since 1977 where he served as Chief for 10 years. He served 6 years on the school board of the Early Independent School district and retired from 3M in 2009 after working there for 36 years.
Having been a member of the school board, having been chief of the fire department, and having been a supervisor at 3M gives Mr. Eoff the experience in serving the public, working on budgets, personnel matters, and such, that is required of council members.
Mr. Eoff is interested in the present and future of the City of Early, and enjoys his opportunity to serve the city as a council member.
